SA15dhkhetuu:139: 00306 tac ca tena ātmanā dṛṣṭam eva pratyakṣeṇa. na ca

SA15dhkhetuu:144: 00311 kāryatas tad-viṣayatvāt smṛtir eva na pramāṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:158: 00319 nānā-yogakṣematvāt. sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthya-bhedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:165: 00406 yathā yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:168: 00408 siddhiḥ, yathā idam asya upalambha upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:171: 00410 asya abhāve na bhavati iti yas tad-bhāve bhāvas tad-abhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:173: 00412 tasya siddhiḥ. kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hy arthāntarasya evaṃ

SA15dhkhetuu:176: 00414 eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tat-kāryatvam. anupalabdhāv apy
SA15dhkhetuu:185: 00422 abhāva-khyāpanaṃ apratibandha-mātra-siddhau sidhyati iti na tatra

SA15dhkhetuu:195: 00509 anyatra na asti ity atra eva niyata ucyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:201: 00515 dharmaṃ svabhāvam icchanti. viśeṣaṇena tathāvidhasya atat-
SA15dhkhetuu:202: 00516 svabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetor vyabhicāraṃ ca āha, yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:206: 00519 yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ saṃś
SA15dhkhetuu:211: 00523 atra sāmarthyād eva pratijñā-arthasya pratīter na pratijñāyāḥ

SA15dhkhetuu:214: 00602 dhūmam upalabdhavatas tasya agninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tat-sāmarthyād
SA15dhkhetuu:215: 00603 eva agnir atra iti pratītir bhavati. na ca tatra kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:216: 00604 agnir atra ity asmai nivedayati. na api prāg eva pratipadyate
SA15dhkhetuu:217: 00605 kiṃcit, pramāṇam antareṇa evaṃ pratīter nimitta-abhāvāt.

SA15dhkhetuu:220: 00608 liṅgam anusarati iti ko ayaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ. pareṇa api
SA15dhkhetuu:224: tena eva tāvad darśitena ko arthaḥ. yadi
SA15dhkhetuu:227: 00612 pratītau vinā api kenacid viṣaya-upasthāpakena pratiyan asmān
SA15dhkhetuu:228: 00613 kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate.

SA15dhkhetuu:230: 00615 pratyeti iti ko anayor avasthayor viśeṣaḥ. dṛṣṭā ca pakṣa-dharma-
SA15dhkhetuu:232: 00617 iti kas tasya upayogaḥ. sva-niścaya-vad anyeṣām api niścaya-utpādanāya

SA15dhkhetuu:243: 00625 nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā pratītiḥ syān na vā. bhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:251: 00706 dharma-bhede tathā api tad-bhāvasya eva khyāpanāt. na hy
SA15dhkhetuu:252: 00707 atat-svabhāvasya bhāva ekāntena anyabhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:255: 00709 tasya nivṛttir yathā anayor eva dharmayor nivṛttiḥ. tasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:256: 00710 anvaya-vyatirekayor yathā-lakṣaṇam eko api prayukto dvitīyam
SA15dhkhetuu:257: 00711 ākṣipati iti na ekatra sādhana-vākye dvayoḥ prayoga iṣyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:260: 00713 tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau ca anvayasya api siddheḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:261: 00714 tad-abhāva eva abhāva-khyātir yathā syān na anyatra viruddhe
SA15dhkhetuu:262: 00715 vā iti niyama-khyāpana-artho api vyatireka-prayogo na yuktaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:264: 00717 katham idam avagamyate sad avaśyaṃ naśvara-svabhāvam iti
SA15dhkhetuu:272: 00721 eva karoti, tasya nivṛtteḥ. na api bhāva-antaram eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:273: 00722 bhāva-antara-karaṇe bhāve tad-avasthe na kiṃcit karoti iti tathā-upalabdhy-
SA15dhkhetuu:274: 00801 ādi-prasaṅgaḥ. na api bhāva-antaram asya āvaraṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:276: 00802 tasminn āvaraṇasya apy ayogāt. na api vināśa-hetunā bhāva-abhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:280: evaṃ ca akartur ahetutvam iti na vināśa-hetuḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:282: 00807 vaiyarthyāc ca. yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmany anavasthāyī-
SA15dhkhetuu:285: 00809 eva svayaṃ nāśāt. yo hi yat svabhāvaḥ sa sva-hetor
SA15dhkhetuu:291: 00814 tadvad asthiti-dharmā cet svabhāvato niṣpanno na punas
SA15dhkhetuu:296: 00818 janayanti, tadvad bhāvo api vināśe syād iti. na tat-svabhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:297: 00819 jananād ajanakasya ca atat-svabhāvatvāt. ata eva
SA15dhkhetuu:300: 00821 anyathātva-abhāvāt tat-svabhāvasya paścād iva prāg api
SA15dhkhetuu:301: 00822 janana-prasaṅgāt. tasmād yo antyo avasthā-viśeṣaḥ sa eva aṅkura-ādi-
SA15dhkhetuu:306: 00904 te antyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti iti, janayanty
SA15dhkhetuu:307: 00905 eva, na atra anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvasya avaiparītyāt. teṣu sarveṣu
SA15dhkhetuu:308: 00906 sahakāriṣu samartha-svabhāveṣu ko aparasya upayoga iti cet, na vai
SA15dhkhetuu:309: 00907 bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣā-pūrva-kāritā yato ayam eko api samarthaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:310: 00908 kim asmābhir ity apare nivarteran. nirabhiprāya-vyāpārā
SA15dhkhetuu:312: 00910 na upālambham arhanti. samarthāḥ kiṃ na aparāparaṃ janayanti
SA15dhkhetuu:313: 00911 iti cet, na, tatra eva sāmarthyāt. tasya eva ekasya janane
SA15dhkhetuu:314: 00912 samarthā na anyasya iti na aparāpara-jananam.
SA15dhkhetuu:316: 00914 kārya-utpattau na kāraṇa-bhedāt kārya-bhedaḥ syād iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:321: 00918 vṛkṣa-ādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāt tasya eva mṛd-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:323: 00920 tasya eva mṛt-saṃsthāna-viśeṣa-ātmanaś cakra-āder vibhaktaḥ svabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:324: 00921 bhavati; tad evaṃ na kulālān mṛt-svabhāvatā, na
SA15dhkhetuu:332: 01006 svabhāvaḥ kulāla-mṛt-piṇḍayor upayoga-viṣaya iti cet, uktam
SA15dhkhetuu:333: 01007 atra. api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:335: 01008 na pṛthak karoti. guṇasya dravya-paratantratvam iti na pṛthak
SA15dhkhetuu:336: 01009 karoti. tat-saṃsthāna-ādhāra-ātmakaṃ yadi svabhāvena tad dravyaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:340: 01012 vastuna eva yogyatā dharmatā iti prāg api mṛt-piṇḍasya saṃsthāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:342: 01014 prasaṅgaḥ. evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛd-dravyasya kulālād
SA15dhkhetuu:345: 01016 asti tāvad eka-svabhāvatve api kasyacid aneka-pratyaya-upadheya-
SA15dhkhetuu:348: 01019 tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā na eka-upayoga-viṣayāḥ kārya-
SA15dhkhetuu:349: 01020 svabhāvasya ekatve api vastuta iti yathā iha kāraṇa-bhedo bhinna-
SA15dhkhetuu:350: 01021 viśeṣa-upayogān na eka-kāryas tathā cakṣur-ādibhyo vijñāna-utpattāv
SA15dhkhetuu:354: 01103 tat tulya-rūpatā ity abhinnatve api vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:355: 01104 bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavanti iti na
SA15dhkhetuu:356: 01105 kāraṇa-bhede apy abhedas tat-kārya-viśeṣasya. ta eva ete kāraṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:359: 01108 sthity-āśraya ity ucyante. tathā hi tat tebhyaḥ samastebhya
SA15dhkhetuu:361: 01110 rūpaṃ ca iti prativiśiṣṭa-svabhāvam ekaṃ jātam.
SA15dhkhetuu:363: 01112 pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakāra-artha iti cet, na vai
SA15dhkhetuu:364: 01113 sarvatra atiśaya-utpādanaṃ sahakriyā. kiṃ tarhi. bahūnāṃ yad
SA15dhkhetuu:369: 01116 kāraṇatvāt tatra ca kṣaṇa ekasya svabhāvasya avivekād viśeṣasya
SA15dhkhetuu:372: 01118 utpatteḥ. bhāva-antara-utpattāv antyaṃ na syāt, tataś ca na
SA15dhkhetuu:373: 01119 sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ syāt. tasmān na kāraṇasya sahakāribhyo viśeṣa-
SA15dhkhetuu:374: 01120 utpattiḥ. te samarthāḥ svabhāvato antyāḥ pratyayāḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:375: 01121 saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prāg-paścāt-pṛthag-bhāvo na asti
SA15dhkhetuu:383: tataś ca eko api kvacid janayed iti
SA15dhkhetuu:385: 01205 saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:387: tathā api bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ;
SA15dhkhetuu:390: 01208 tatra yo avyavadhāna-ādi-deśo rūpa-indriya-ādi-kalāpaḥ sa vijñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:391: 01209 janane samartho hetuḥ. yas teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:393: 01211 teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścān na pṛthag bhāva iti samarthān
SA15dhkhetuu:394: 01212 api pūrva-apara-pṛthag-bhāva-bhāvino doṣā na upalīyante. tena yas
SA15dhkhetuu:395: 01213 teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-ādi-hetuḥ sa samarthasya hetur iti tatra
SA15dhkhetuu:396: 01214 na kadācid anyathābhāvaḥ. anena nyāyena sarvatra hetu-phala-
SA15dhkhetuu:402: 01219 anya-sahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:404: 01220 janane samarthaḥ svabhāvo asamartho vā samartha iti cet, kiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:405: 01221 na karoti, akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ. kuvinda-ādayaḥ paṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkhetuu:406: 01222 kriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvadā kurvanti iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:409: 01301 mūrkhaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtam api punaḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:410: 01302 kārayati, tathā hy etad bīja-ādy-upanyāse nirloṭhitam. tasmāt
SA15dhkhetuu:418: 01308 api ca sa eva tāvat sakala-sahakāri-sahitaḥ kāryaṃ kasmāt
SA15dhkhetuu:420: tena karoti iti brūmaḥ. aho mahā-sāmarthyaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:423: 01312 kadācit kiṃcit kathaṃcit atra-bhavanto darśana-patham atikrāmet,
SA15dhkhetuu:425: 01314 cintā cittaṃ dunoti. na vai vayam atat-svabhāvānām asmad-darśana-
SA15dhkhetuu:426: 01315 vaśāt kārya-kriyāṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. svabhāvena eva te
SA15dhkhetuu:428: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe ta ete
SA15dhkhetuu:432: 01318 dharmā, tena samasta-pratyayavatām akṛtvā na upekṣā āpattir iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:433: 01319 so akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadā eva antya-
SA15dhkhetuu:434: 01320 avasthāyām utpanna āhosvit prāg apy āsīt. āsīt,
SA15dhkhetuu:437: 01401 virodhāt. tat kim idānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca; ko vā asya
SA15dhkhetuu:438: 01402 bhāṣitasya artho akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā ca svabhāvo na ca karoti iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:439: 01403 sahitas tat-svabhāvo na kevala iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:443: 01405 na hi sa sāhitye api pararūpeṇa kartā;
SA15dhkhetuu:445: 01406 api tad eva iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyā-virāmaḥ. yasya api bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:446: 01407 kṣaṇikas tasya api kasmāt kevalo na karoti,
SA15dhkhetuu:448: 01408 kathaṃ na bhavati. kṣaṇikatvāt. uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā. sa katham
SA15dhkhetuu:449: 01409 eka-kṣaṇa-bhāvy anyathā bhavet. yaś ca bhavati, sa eva na
SA15dhkhetuu:453: 01412 yo api manyate akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā eva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:456: 01414 iti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti, tasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:457: 01415 kathaṃ sa kevalo api karoty eva kāryaṃ ca tasmān na utpadyate
SA15dhkhetuu:458: 01416 iti tad-avastho virodhaḥ. na kevalaḥ karoty eva iti cet, katham
SA15dhkhetuu:459: 01417 idānīm akṣepa-kriyā-svabhāvaḥ. nanv etad eva paridīpitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:461: kāryaṃ ca ayaṃ kevalo api samarthaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:462: 01419 san param apekṣamānaṃ katham upekṣeta. param anādṛtya etad
SA15dhkhetuu:464: evaṃ hy anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:465: 01421 bhavati. kāryaṃ param apekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattir
SA15dhkhetuu:467: sa kevalo api samartha-svabhāva iti tata utpattiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:468: 01502 brūṣe, ete ca ekatra kathaṃ syātām. tad ayam īrśyā-śalya-vitudyamāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:469: 01503 marmā viklavaṃ vikrośati ity upekṣām arhati.
SA15dhkhetuu:474: 01507 yatra tu santāna-upakāreṇa bhāvā hetutāṃ pratipadyante
SA15dhkhetuu:482: na hi taṇḍula-ādīnāṃ dahana-ādau krameṇa svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:486: 01515 akṣepa-kāriṣu tv indriya-ādiṣu na viśeṣa-utpattiḥ parasparataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:490: 01518 hetutāṃ pratipadyanta iti tatra eka-arthakriyā eva sahakāritvam.
SA15dhkhetuu:491: 01519 yatra viśeṣa-utpādanena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayās tatra hetu-
SA15dhkhetuu:492: 01520 santānaḥ pratyayān apekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāva-antara-pratilambha-
SA15dhkhetuu:494: 01522 tebhya eva viśiṣṭa-kṣaṇa-utpādāt krameṇa yāvad atiśayavato
SA15dhkhetuu:497: 01602 eva utpattir na yuktā. aviśiṣṭād viśeṣa-utpattau kāryasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:498: 01603 syāt; paraspara-viśeṣa-utpādān apekṣiṇo api sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:499: 01604 kurvīran. tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāry-anapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatā
SA15dhkhetuu:500: 01605 syāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāva-atiśaya-utpattiś ca na syāt. atha
SA15dhkhetuu:501: 01606 sahakāriṇā kṛta-viśeṣa eva viśeṣa-utpādāv apy upatiṣṭheta; evam
SA15dhkhetuu:502: 01607 anavasthā syāt. na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara-kārya-utpāda-anuguṇa
SA15dhkhetuu:503: 01608 viśeṣa-utpādane nityaṃ yogya-avasthā yena eṣāṃ paraspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:506: 01610 viraha-darśanāt. tena ādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya
SA15dhkhetuu:508: na asmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacane kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:510: yady evam api lokasya nyāya-pratītir bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:511: 01613 hanta tarhy ucyatām. na viśeṣa-utpādanād eva sahakāriṇāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:512: 01614 sahakāritvāṃ yatas tad-abhāvād viśeṣa-janane sahakāriṇo na
SA15dhkhetuu:513: 01615 syuḥ. kiṃ tarhi. eka-arthakriyāyā api. sa api bhavet parasparato
SA15dhkhetuu:517: 01617 viśeṣa-bhāvi kāryam api kevalād bhavet iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:519: 01618 aparāparaiḥ pratyayair yathā bhāva-santāne viśeṣa-utpattir yogya-
SA15dhkhetuu:520: 01619 deśatā-ādy-avasthā-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca kārya-karaṇaṃ teṣāṃ ca yata
SA15dhkhetuu:521: 01620 utpattiḥ pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye api yathā kevalānām akriyā-
SA15dhkhetuu:525: 01704 bhedād iti sarvam uktam. tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santāna-upakāra-
SA15dhkhetuu:531: 01708 na anavasthā. tathā yady akṣaṇiko api bhāva ādya-viśeṣa-kāraṇa-vad
SA15dhkhetuu:537: 01711 api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.
SA15dhkhetuu:538: 01712 tasmād akṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ na eka-arthakriyayā kaścit
SA15dhkhetuu:539: 01713 sahakāritva-niyamo na api santāna-upakāreṇa iti na tasya kaścit sahakārī;
SA15dhkhetuu:540: 01714 tasmāt kevalo api kuryāt. prāyas tu saṃghāta-sthāyī bhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:545: 01718 ucyate. kārakasya svabhāvasya prāg api bhāvo akriyā na yujyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:546: 01801 tasmād yo yad-ātmā sa sattā-mātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati;
SA15dhkhetuu:547: 01802 na bhūtvā tad-bhāve para-abhisaṃskāram apekṣate. svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:552: 01805 kartum aśakyatvāt. anyathātva-pratipattau vā tat-svabhāva eva
SA15dhkhetuu:553: 01806 na syād iti pūrva eva vikalpaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:554: tatra ca uktam. yaś ca parasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:555: 01807 anyathābhāvaḥ so aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaś ca aparaḥ sa kathaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:556: 01808 tasya, svabhāva-bheda-lakṣaṇatvād bhāva-bhedasya. tathā ca pūrvako
SA15dhkhetuu:557: 01809 bhāvo acyuti-dharme sthita iti na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:559: 01811 svabhāva-antara-utpattiḥ pratyuktā. tatra api pūrvakasya sva-rasa-nirodhitvād
SA15dhkhetuu:560: 01812 vināśe agny-āder upādānāc ca apara eva drava-ādi-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:565: na ca vināśo nāma aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:568: 01817 dvayam atikrāmati. kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ svabhāvena āhosvid anityo iti
SA15dhkhetuu:569: 01818 vikalpe prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo bhavati iti bruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:571: 01820 bhāva-dvayaṃ ca svayaṃ ca nāśam anāśaṃ ca prāha iti
SA15dhkhetuu:572: 01821 pūrvasmin vināśa-hetur asamarthaḥ. na prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād
SA15dhkhetuu:573: 01822 anityo bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. paścād api nityo eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:575: 01823 sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam anāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo
SA15dhkhetuu:577: 01902 tasmāt saty asya vināśe vināśa-svabhāvena anena bhavitavyam.
SA15dhkhetuu:578: 01903 tathā api vyartho vināśa-hetur ity uktam. tena svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:579: 01904 naśvare anaśvare vā bhāve na vināśa-hetor upayogaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:580: 01905 tasmād vināśe anapekṣo bhāvas tad-bhāva-niyata iti yaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:584: 01908 svabhāvato naśvaratve api kaścid atat-svabhāvo api syāt, na
SA15dhkhetuu:585: 01909 hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na anvaya-vyatireka-siddhir iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:586: 01910 na, akṣaṇikatve avastutva-prasaṅgāt. śaktir hi bhāva-lakṣaṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:587: 01911 sarva-śakti-viraho abhāva-lakṣaṇam. na ca akṣaṇya kvacit kācic
SA15dhkhetuu:589: 01913 sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti vyāpti-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:595: 01918 kāryaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir avinābhāvi kāraṇe, teṣāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:597: tair eva ca dharmair ye tair
SA15dhkhetuu:598: 01920 vinā na bhavanti. aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet, na,
SA15dhkhetuu:601: 02002 kasyacit kadācit kutaścit bhāve api sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidha-
SA15dhkhetuu:602: 02003 janmā iti kuto avasitam. tathā ca na anvaya-vyatirekāv iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:603: 02004 na, atad-bhāvinas tasya sakṛd api tato abhāvāt. paraspara-apekṣayā
SA15dhkhetuu:607: 02007 svabhāvo na bhavati iti sakṛd api tato na bhaved arthāntara-vat,
SA15dhkhetuu:610: 02009 vat. na ca dhūmasya tad-ataj-janya-svabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:617: 02014 viśeṣa-janitaḥ so dhūma iti kārya-kāraṇayor evaṃ svabhāva-niyamāt
SA15dhkhetuu:618: 02015 tad vijātīyād utpattir na bhavati. tat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:619: 02016 na vyabhicarati. tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya
SA15dhkhetuu:621: 02018 nanu vijātīyād api kiṃcid bhavad dṛṣṭam, tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:622: 02019 gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
SA15dhkhetuu:623: 02020 eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena
SA15dhkhetuu:624: 02101 vṛttau tu śarād bhavati. asti ca gomaya-itara-janman-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:629: 02104 jāti-bheda-darśanāt. anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā
SA15dhkhetuu:631: 02106 abhedāv ity ahetukau viśvasya bheda-abhedau syātām. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:632: 02107 hi na bhedād bheda ity abhedād api na abhedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:634: 02108 ca na kaścid bhāva-svabhāva ity ahetukatvād bhāvānāṃ nityaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:637: 02110 bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti vyavasthāvāṃś ca sādhyeṣu
SA15dhkhetuu:638: 02111 sādhana-niyogo na syāt. kāraṇa-śakti-pratiniyame hi kiṃcid eva
SA15dhkhetuu:644: 02114 taj-janana-svabhāva-vilakṣaṇād api tasya utpattau na taj-janana-
SA15dhkhetuu:646: 02116 śakti-sāmye tu tad eva iti na kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.
SA15dhkhetuu:656: 02202 yogyatā eva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat. yatra yasminn upalabhyamāne
SA15dhkhetuu:657: 02203 niyamena yasya upalabdhir bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt,
SA15dhkhetuu:662: 02206 eka-jñāna-saṃsargiṇoḥ paraspara-apekṣam eva anyatvam iha abhipretam,
SA15dhkhetuu:664: 02208 tad-anya iti taj-jñānaṃ tat-svabhāvo vā jñātṛ-jñeya-dharma-
SA15dhkhetuu:671: 02213 vṛttyā apekṣāto abhāvo anupalabdhiś ca anupalabdhiḥ. na pratiṣedha-
SA15dhkhetuu:673: 02215 prasaṅgāt. tasya asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya bhāva-siddhir eva aparasya abhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:674: 02216 siddhir ity anyabhāvo api tad-abhāva iti vyapadeśyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:676: 02218 vyavahāraṃ sādhayet tat-siddhi-siddho vā tad-abhāva iti
SA15dhkhetuu:679: 02301 syāt. sa eva anyabhāvas tad-viṣayā ca upalabdhis tad-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:687: 02306 agni-vat. anyabhāva-siddhyā eva tad-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:690: 02309 sambandha-abhāvāc ca. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:693: 02311 samavāyo dhūmasya liṅginaś ca eka-artha-samavāyo vā ādhārādheyabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:694: 02312 vā janyajanakabhāvo vā. na evaṃ kaścid bhāva-abhāvayoḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:697: 02314 asti viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ śabda-artha-sambandha-vad iti cet, śabda-
SA15dhkhetuu:698: 02315 arthayos tat-pratipādana-abhiprāye sati tat-prayogāt tena saha
SA15dhkhetuu:700: 02317 ayaṃ ca atra na sambhavati iti kathaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:701: 02318 siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tan-mukhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:702: 02319 syāt; sa eva asati sambandhe na sidhyati;
SA15dhkhetuu:704: 02320 viṣayaviṣayibhāvo api na. anyathā itaretara-āśrayam idaṃ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:705: 02321 anyabhāvāc ca abhāva-siddhāv asamudāyaś ca sādhyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:706: 02322 syāt. tathā ca ghaṭa-abhāvas tad-anyabhāvād iti ghaṭasya sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:709: 02401 cet; pradeśa-ādi-dharmi-viśeṣaṇa-bhūto abhāvaḥ sādhyate, na tu
SA15dhkhetuu:710: 02402 kevalaḥ; tato na asamudāyasya sādhyatā. na ca liṅga-liṅginor
SA15dhkhetuu:713: pradeśa-āder eva anyabhāvatvāt. yatra eva hi
SA15dhkhetuu:714: 02405 pradeśe yan na asti ity ucyate sa eva tena asaṃsṛṣṭo anyabhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:715: 02406 tad-darśanād eva asya ghaṭo na asti iti vikalpa iti kathaṃ tasya eva
SA15dhkhetuu:717: 02408 na ca atra sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāva-kalpanā sambhavati, yena
SA15dhkhetuu:718: 02409 sāmānyaṃ hetur bhavet viśeṣo dharmī iti,
SA15dhkhetuu:720: 02410 tad-abhāvasya pratītes tasya ca anyatra anya-abhāvāt. pratijñārthaikadeśatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:721: 02411 ca na hetutvam. na ca yatra pradeśa-mātraṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:722: 02412 tatra ghaṭa-abhāvaḥ. tādṛśe kevale pradeśe abhāva eva iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:723: 02413 nanu tasya eva kevala iti ghaṭa-viraha iti. sa ca liṅgabhūta-
SA15dhkhetuu:724: 02414 pradeśa-pratipattāv eva siddhaḥ. kasya idānīṃ tal liṅgam. anvayasya
SA15dhkhetuu:725: 02415 anugamanaṃ ca nirarthakam. tasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam
SA15dhkhetuu:731: 02419 kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭo,
SA15dhkhetuu:733: 02420 sambandhaḥ syāt. abhāvas tu pratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena aviruddhaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:735: 02422 virodhaḥ. tasmāt sambandha-abhāvaḥ. atra apy asamudāya-sādhyatvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:738: 02425 gatyā api tad-abhāva-gatir na syād iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:745: 02504 tasya kaivalyam aparasya vaikalyam iti tad-anyabhāva
SA15dhkhetuu:748: 02506 iti. anyathā tasya paricchedena tato anyasya avyavacchede
SA15dhkhetuu:751: 02508 vyavahāraḥ kasyacid darśanāt kvacit prāpti-parihāra-arthaḥ, sa
SA15dhkhetuu:752: 02509 na syāt. na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann api kevalam analam
SA15dhkhetuu:761: 02514 pratipattiḥ. tasya tato vā anyasya kasyacid apy apratipattāv
SA15dhkhetuu:763: 02516 pṛṣṭhībhava-ādy-avasthāsv apy abhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate. bhūyo api
SA15dhkhetuu:764: 02517 vicāritaṃ pramāṇaviniścaye. tasmād ayam analaṃ paśyann apy
SA15dhkhetuu:765: 02518 analo ayaṃ na salilam ity anadhyavasyan na tiṣṭhen na api
SA15dhkhetuu:766: 02519 pratiṣṭheta iti dustaraṃ vyasanaṃ pratipannaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:767: 02520 tata eva ekasya darśanād anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:768: 02521 katham ekaṃ dṛṣṭam anyan na asti iti pratyāyayati. kevalasya
SA15dhkhetuu:772: 02602 paruṣam iva ābhāti. tasmāt tīra-adarśinā eva śakuninā paryaṭā
SA15dhkhetuu:773: 02603 api pratyāgantavyam ity alam avidyamāna-pratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:775: 02605 yady eka-paricchedād eva anya-vyavacchedaḥ sidhyati, sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:784: 02611 tad-anyasya ātmā bhavati. anya-ātmano avyavacchede pravṛtti-
SA15dhkhetuu:785: 02612 nivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. taṃ ca deśa-kāla-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:787: 02614 pracyutim asya vyavacchinatti. evaṃ hi sa tayā paricchinno
SA15dhkhetuu:788: 02615 yady anyathābhāvo vyavacchinno bhavati tathātvaṃ ca
SA15dhkhetuu:789: 02616 tasya eva bhavati na anyasya ity anyathābhūtād vyavacchindaty
SA15dhkhetuu:790: 02617 eva tat paricchinatti. evam ekasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ sarva-
SA15dhkhetuu:798: 02623 tasmāt kvacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ tat paricchinatti
SA15dhkhetuu:800: 02701 sūcayati iti eka-pramāṇa-vyāpāra eṣaḥ. tathā hi kvacit pramāṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:804: 02704 tatra aparicchedāt. atas tad eva pramāṇaṃ prakāra-antara-abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:805: 02705 sādhayati, tasmin dṛśyamāne adṛṣṭasya tad-anyatvena sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:806: 02706 vyavasthāpanād atad-anyasya eva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:808: 02709 tad evaṃ ekasya upalambhāt tasya tad-anya-ātmano vyavacchedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:809: 02710 na tad-deśa-kālayoḥ sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya vyavacchedaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:810: 02711 tasmād atadātmā ca syāt tad-deśa-kālaś ca,
SA15dhkhetuu:812: 02712 vat. tasmād yathoktād eva anupalambhāt kvacit kadācit
SA15dhkhetuu:814: 02714 anyabhāva-viṣaya-upalabdhir api tad-abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:818: 02717 siddheḥ. na hy anyabhāvaṃ pratipadya tat-pratipatter anvaya-
SA15dhkhetuu:819: 02718 vyatirekau prasādhya tad-abhāvaṃ pratipadyate. kiṃ tarhi.
SA15dhkhetuu:821: 02720 darśana-anantaraṃ vyavadhānena vinā idam asti idaṃ tu na asti iti
SA15dhkhetuu:823: dṛṣṭānta-asiddheḥ. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yad
SA15dhkhetuu:824: 02722 yasya anvayi vyatireki ca. na hy evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anya-
SA15dhkhetuu:827: 02724 abhāvāt. sāmānyena pradarśane dṛṣṭānte api pramāṇa-antara-abhāvāt
SA15dhkhetuu:828: 02725 sā eva tad-anyabhāva-upalabdhiḥ sādhya-dharmasya sādhikā iti
SA15dhkhetuu:830: 02801 tasmān na kutaścil liṅgād abhāva-siddhiḥ. so anyabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:833: 02804 sā iyaṃ tridhā anupalabdhiḥ. siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:837: 02808 anyabhāva-siddher eva. sa tatra asiddhaḥ kārya-vyāpyayor abhāvam
SA15dhkhetuu:838: 02809 abhāva-vyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati. svabhāva-anupalabdhau tv anupalabdhyā
SA15dhkhetuu:842: 02813 ca sādhayataḥ sā ca anupalabdhis tayor upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:845: 02815 arthe prayogaḥ. na eva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā,
SA15dhkhetuu:848: 02817 parasya avaśyam abhāva-niścaya iti darśana-artham ete prayujyete.
SA15dhkhetuu:849: 02818 ity eṣa pakṣa-dharmo anvaya-vyatirekavān iti tad-aṃśena
SA15dhkhetuu:850: 02819 vyāptas tri-lakṣaṇas trirūpa eva hetur gamakaḥ, sva-sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:852: 02821 ṣaḍ-lakṣaṇo hetur ity apare. trīṇi ca etāny abādhita-viṣayatvam
SA15dhkhetuu:854: 02902 tatra abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:855: 02903 bādha-avinābhāvayor virodhāt. avinābhāvo hi saty eva sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:856: 02904 dharme bhāvo hetoḥ. sa hetus tal-lakṣaṇo dharmiṇi syāt, atra
SA15dhkhetuu:857: 02905 ca sādhya-dharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet. pratyakṣa-anumāne hi
SA15dhkhetuu:859: 02907 tasmin saty eva hetur bhavaṃs taṃ tatra eva dharmiṇy avasthāpayati
SA15dhkhetuu:860: 02908 iti paraṃ bata bhāvānām asvāsthyam. anyatra
SA15dhkhetuu:861: 02909 sādhya-dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetur na dharmiṇy eva iti cet, tat
SA15dhkhetuu:862: 02910 kim ayaṃ tapasvī ṣaṇḍham udvāhya putraṃ mṛgyate. yasya
SA15dhkhetuu:863: 02911 dharmiṇy asaty api sādhya-dharme bhāvas tam upadarśya
SA15dhkhetuu:864: 02912 kathaṃ sa dharmī sādhya-dharmavān ity ucyate. ata eva bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:866: yata eva hetur anyathā api bhavet, ata
SA15dhkhetuu:867: 02914 eva pramāṇābhyām abādhita-dharmā dharmī ity ucyate iti tat
SA15dhkhetuu:868: 02915 kim idānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam abādhayā eva sādhya-siddheḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:873: 02918 abhāvāt. aniyame na ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhya-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:874: 02919 ca sambhava iti na sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:875: 02920 na bādhāyā abhāvo abādhā. kiṃ tarhi. bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:876: 02921 sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādha-asambhave api syād iti sa
SA15dhkhetuu:877: 02922 hetu-prayogasya viṣayaḥ. kiṃ nu vai hetur bādha-upalabdher api
SA15dhkhetuu:880: 02924 prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ. sa tarhi hetuḥ paramārthena
SA15dhkhetuu:881: 03001 bādhā kim asti na asti ity anapekṣya bādhā-anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:882: 03002 kim arthaṃ prayujyate. sādhya-siddhy-artham. sa kiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:883: 03003 kvacit satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayet,
SA15dhkhetuu:885: 03004 niścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuś ca prayujyate. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:886: 03005 ca abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāyām
SA15dhkhetuu:894: 03010 na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ sāmarthyam iti cet, yady evaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:896: 03012 prayogaṃ na arhati. bādhā-anupalambhe sāmarthyam iti cet, kim
SA15dhkhetuu:899: 03014 kṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet. atha tan-nivṛttau bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:900: 03015 nivartate, tathā api bādhā-anupalambhād eva sādhya-siddher vyartho
SA15dhkhetuu:901: 03016 hetuḥ, anupalambhe bādhāyā asambhavāt. upalambhasya nivṛttāv
SA15dhkhetuu:902: 03017 api bādhāyā anivṛttau tad-avasthaṃ hetor asāmarthyam
SA15dhkhetuu:903: 03018 ity aprayogaḥ. tasmāt sva-sādhya-bhāva-abhāvābhyām anyathā api
SA15dhkhetuu:904: 03019 bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiṃcin na bhāvayati na vibhāvayati ity
SA15dhkhetuu:905: 03020 upakṣepo na samarthaḥ. tan na bādhā-avinābhāvau sahāvasthitau;
SA15dhkhetuu:908: 03023 vā bhavet, yasya bhāve api yasya anyasya abhāvaḥ. tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:909: 03024 pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti. na ca etad bādhāyā avinābhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:910: 03101 sati sambhavati iti na sādhya-viparyaya-avibhāvinor hetu-viruddhayor
SA15dhkhetuu:911: 03102 viṣaye bādhā sambhavati iti na tad-abhāvaḥ pṛthag
SA15dhkhetuu:912: 03103 anayor lakṣaṇa-antaratvena vācyaḥ. tasmād hetoḥ prayoge
SA15dhkhetuu:913: 03104 pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ sambhavo na asti. na api kevalā pratijñā
SA15dhkhetuu:915: 03106 etena eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā api pratyuktā. katham. eko hi sva-
SA15dhkhetuu:916: 03107 sādhya-bhāva eva bhāvāt tad-avyabhicārī. tatra eva tasmād anyas
SA15dhkhetuu:917: 03108 tad-bādhakasya eva bhāvāt tad-viruddha ity atra bādhayā
SA15dhkhetuu:919: 03110 api ca kiṃ vastuto asambhavat-pratihetuḥ sa samyag-jñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:920: 03111 viparyaya-hetur āhosvid apradarśita-pratihetuḥ kiṃ ca ataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:923: 03113 etat. hetv-abhāvo vā. na hy aniścita-ātmanaḥ pratipādaka-dharmasya
SA15dhkhetuu:925: 03115 na api sandigdha-lakṣaṇo hetur bhavati iti na kaścid hetur
SA15dhkhetuu:926: 03116 bhavet. tulya-lakṣaṇe hi dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyogi-sambhavo adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkhetuu:931: 03119 sva-sādhyaṃ niścāyayati ity atal-lakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt. tathā ca
SA15dhkhetuu:933: 03121 hīyeta svalakṣaṇa-yuktayor hetvor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena upanipāte
SA15dhkhetuu:934: 03122 viruddhāvyabhicārī iti. na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:937: 03124 utpaśyāmaḥ. tasmān na asty eva viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā
SA15dhkhetuu:939: dṛṣṭa-pratihetor api hetoḥ prāg itareṇa na kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:940: 03202 viśeṣo lakṣyate. na ca sambhavat-pratihetūnām api sarvadā
SA15dhkhetuu:942: atiśayavatī tu prajñā-utprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā. tena aniścayaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:950: 03208 hetuṃ kṛtakatva-ādi kaścin na darśayed iti. idam aprakāśyam
SA15dhkhetuu:951: 03209 apy asaṃvaraṇīyam api iti kaṣṭhataraṃ vyasanam āyātaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:952: 03210 kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta. sa tāvad ayaṃ hetur vastūni
SA15dhkhetuu:956: 03214 vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣān tadbhāva-sampadaḥ pracyāvya-
SA15dhkhetuu:957: 03215 bhraṣṭa-rājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati iti kiṃ atra brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:958: 03216 puruṣa-pratibhākṛtaṃ ca sādhanatvam. tat kiṃ vastutaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:959: 03217 sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā. sa ca hetuḥ svabhāvatas tad-dharma-bhāvī
SA15dhkhetuu:963: 03220 ca katham anyadā api sādhanaṃ kasyacit.
SA15dhkhetuu:969: 03303 bhaviṣyati. kiṃ-rūpāl liṅgād artho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipattur
SA15dhkhetuu:973: 03306 pratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate. tathā yad asya ātma-rūpaṃ tal
SA15dhkhetuu:974: 03307 lakṣaṇam, na tu pararūpam. pratipatti-janmany upayoga-mātrāt
SA15dhkhetuu:977: na hi teṣv asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhkhetuu:978: 03310 niścita-grahaṇaṃ tarhi na kartavyam. na na kartavyam,
SA15dhkhetuu:980: 03312 hetum icchatāṃ na eva samartho hetur bhavati, sator api
SA15dhkhetuu:982: 03314 gamaka iti jñāpana-arthaṃ niścita-grahaṇam. tena pararūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:993: 03320 sattā-vyavasthāyās tayor eva sattā-prasiddher iti sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:994: 03401 sattā-vyavasthā eva tat-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākarṣati. parārthatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:996: 03403 arthasya iti tad rūpaṃ ye na vidanti,
SA15dhkhetuu:1003: 03407 anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sattāyāṃ saṃśayāt. tasmād yataḥ sattā-
SA15dhkhetuu:1004: 03408 prasādhaka-pramāṇād anayor niścayas tad-adhīnā iti jñāpana-artham
SA15dhkhetuu:1007: 03411 pṛthag ato jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:1012: 03414 iti cet, na, hetoḥ sapakṣa-asapakṣayor bhāva-abhāvayor aparaspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:1013: 03415 ākṣepāt; ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayati ity ucyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:1014: 03416 na eko artho dvitīyasya. nanu tatra eva bhāvo tad-abhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:1015: 03417 ca abhāva iti vākye paraspara-ākṣepa iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:1018: 03419 ubhayam ākṣipati na punaḥ kevalau bhāva-abhāvāv ākṣipataḥ;
SA15dhkhetuu:1021: 03421 tasmāt tatra eva bhāva iti na bhāva eva ucyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:1023: 03501 eva, yena bhāvo abhāvo vā dvitīyam ākṣipet. na evaṃ jñānaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:1024: 03502 para-upalakṣaṇāt trailakṣaṇyād vyatirekitam iti na lakṣaṇa-antaram.
